Package com.akkaserverless.javasdk.replicatedentity

Interface CommandContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClientActionContext, Context, EffectContext, EntityContext, MetadataContext, ReplicatedDataFactory, ReplicatedEntityContext
    public interface CommandContext
extends ReplicatedEntityContext, ReplicatedDataFactory, EffectContext, ClientActionContext, MetadataContext
    Context for handling a command.

    This may be passed to any CommandHandler annotated element.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • commandId

        long commandId()
        The id of the command. This is an internal ID generated by the proxy, and is unique to a given entity stream. It may be used for debugging purposes.
        Returns:
        The ID of the command.

      • commandName

        String commandName()
        The name of the command.

        Corresponds to the name of the rpc call in the protobuf definition.

        Returns:
        The name of the command.

      • delete

        void delete()
        Delete the replicated entity.

        When a replicated entity is deleted, it may not be created again. Additionally, replicated entity deletion results in tombstones that get accumulated for the life of the cluster. If you expect to delete replicated entities frequently, it's recommended that you store them in a single or sharded ReplicatedMap, rather than individual replicated entities.
